description:
The musical director of the Roux-Marlet Orchestra in Paris. He hires Chiaki as the Orchestra`s new resident conductor after hearing his performance at his Paris Debut and at the recommendation of Stresemann who used to be the Conductor of the orchestra. Like the character of Megumi Noda, he is based on a real person of the same name. the real James DePriest is currently the Permanent Conductor of The Tokyo Metropolitan Symphony Orchestra. DePriest also conducted the Nodame Orchestra, which provided the music for both the live-action drama and anime adaptations.
Source: Wikipedia
name: James DePreist
